*For a better experience turn on the location in your device
We need access to your location in order to provide you the weather.
*Danger! Winter is coming, time to wear all your closet at the same time!\n\n
*It very cold outside. Get a sweater or a winter jacket, also do not forget your scarf and gloves.\n\n
*Do not underestimate this cold weather, you will need a sweater and a cup of hot chocolate.\n\n
*With a light jacket or sweater you will be fine.\n\n
*Such a nice weather, perfect for jeans and a t-shirt.\n\n
*Time to get those shorts and invite yourself to a friends house with a swimming pool.\n\n
*Dip in the pool, get your clothes of first, hello?..u there?\n\n
*Red alert! Going outside will melt your brain.\n\n
*This is illegal.
*It might start raining right now.\n\n
*There is a high probability of raining right now.\n\n
*So much humidity, yuck.\n\n
*So much wind! Try to not fly away.\n\n
*So much wind! If you go out do not forget to close all the windows.\n\n
*The wind is peaceful today, its a perfect day to use your new wig.\n\n
*There is a high change that it will start raining later!\n\n
*There is a high change that it will stop raining later!\n\n
*There is a small change that it will stop raining later.\n\n
*There is a small change that it will start raining lather.\n\n
*The temperature will increase a lot later.\n\n
*The temperature will decrease a lot later.\n\n
*The temperature will increase a little later\n\n
*The temperature will decrease a little later.\n\n
